title: US Census 2024 County Boundaries with H3 Indexing
description: 2024 county and equivalent boundaries from the US Census Bureau's TIGER/Line shapefiles, processing 3,235 counties and equivalents into cloud-native formats with H3 hexagonal spatial indexing at resolution 10 (~0.015 kmÂ² per hex). Includes traditional counties, Louisiana parishes, Alaska boroughs/census areas, independent cities, Puerto Rico municipios, and other territory equivalents.

geoparquet.title: GeoParquet file with all 3,235 county boundaries

table:columns.name: _cng_fid
table:columns.description: Cloud-native geometry feature ID. Unique identifier for each county.

table:columns.name: STATEFP
table:columns.description: State FIPS code (2 digits).

table:columns.name: COUNTYFP
table:columns.description: County FIPS code (3 digits).

table:columns.name: COUNTYNS
table:columns.description: County GNIS identifier (8 digits).

table:columns.name: GEOID
table:columns.description: Geographic identifier (STATEFP + COUNTYFP, 5 digits total).

table:columns.name: GEOIDFQ
table:columns.description: Fully qualified geographic identifier.

table:columns.name: NAME
table:columns.description: County or equivalent name (e.g., 'Los Angeles', 'Orleans Parish').

table:columns.name: NAMELSAD
table:columns.description: Full name with legal/statistical area description (e.g., 'Los Angeles County', 'Orleans Parish').

table:columns.name: LSAD
table:columns.description: Legal/Statistical Area Description code: 00=Blank, 03=City and Borough, 04=Borough, 05=Census Area, 06=County, 07=District, 10=Island, 12=Municipality, 13=Municipio, 15=Parish, 25=City.

table:columns.name: CLASSFP
table:columns.description: FIPS class code identifying type of county or equivalent (e.g., C1-C7 for counties, H1 for independent cities).

table:columns.name: MTFCC
table:columns.description: MAF/TIGER Feature Class Code (G4020 for county/equivalent).

table:columns.name: CSAFP
table:columns.description: Combined Statistical Area FIPS code (3 digits). Null if not in a CSA.

table:columns.name: CBSAFP
table:columns.description: Core Based Statistical Area FIPS code (5 digits). Metropolitan/Micropolitan statistical area code. Null if not in a CBSA.

table:columns.name: METDIVFP
table:columns.description: Metropolitan Division FIPS code (5 digits). Subdivision of large metropolitan areas. Null if not applicable.

table:columns.name: FUNCSTAT
table:columns.description: Functional status: A=Active government, B=Active government that is partially consolidated, C=Active government consolidated with another, F=Fictitious entity, G=Active government consolidated with place, N=Nonfunctioning legal entity, S=Statistical entity.

table:columns.name: ALAND
table:columns.description: Land area in square meters.

table:columns.name: AWATER
table:columns.description: Water area in square meters.

table:columns.name: INTPTLAT
table:columns.description: Internal point latitude (decimal degrees).

table:columns.name: INTPTLON
table:columns.description: Internal point longitude (decimal degrees).

table:columns.name: geom
table:columns.description: Geometry column (multipolygon) in WKB format, EPSG:4326.

table:columns.name: bbox
table:columns.description: Bounding box (xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax).
